name: Minecraft Pocket Manager File
summary: A MODPKG file is a package file used by BlockLauncher, an app that allows users to load game modifications into the Minecraft: Pocket Edition game for Android. It contains a modification to gameplay, such as unique blocks, decoration items (tables, TVs, etc.), backpacks, and other textures. MODPKG files are compressed with Zip compression

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
